Ken Burman
Delivering more than promised.  Persuasive, highly experienced, manic about delivering quality
July 25, 2014, Ken worked with Andrew in different groups

Andrew Bloo is one of those fairly rare individuals who are both highly intelligent, and highly personable.   Add in deeply knowledgeable, and fun to work with, and you begin to get the picture of why working with Andrew is both a pleasure, and very instructive.Although we had not worked together for a while, when I needed advise and assistance in developing a new concept, relating to qualifying software outsourcing companies, I did not hesitate to contact him for help.  This was when, as a principal at 27Launches, he was incredibly busy helping launch other ventures.   After some very stimulating and productive conversations, and with his terrific sense of both business and current software trends, we decided to jointly launch DeverlopHighRise.com, a company who believes that we can take much of the burden of locating reliable and trustworthy outsourcing companies from clients, by carefully selecting and qualifying such organizations.Without his invaluable help, this concept would still be rattling around in my brain!I do most whole-heartedly recommend Andrew to any CEO/CFO/C?? who needs sage, relevant, and timely technology-oriented business advise.Ken Burmanhttp://ca.linkedin.com/pub/ken-burman/3/1a7/162

Lawrence Stanley
President of The Cap-X Group, LLC, Visionary Entrepreneur, Revolutionizing innovation and technology
July 24, 2014, Andrew worked with Lawrence in the same group

There are many different types of experienced leaders who provide value. While most good leaders are intelligent, determined, and visionary, great leaders like Andrew are also self-aware,  motivating, empathetic, and socially skilled to deliver the highest level of marketing and technology expertise.    During a critical period when technology and concept were becoming static, we were able to minimize touch-points and redirect our team without disrupting marketing flow or having to redefine our target audience. Andrew provided the foundation for our revised direction while instilling confidence in our team to accomplish what seemed at the moment a less desirable product.    I would not hesitate jumping into any complex and challenging initiative knowing that Andrew is providing the steady hand and guidance with our marketing and technology efforts.Best,Lawrence Stanley

April 25, 2012, Jay reported directly to Andrew

Andrew is a confident, capable and experienced marketer, who understands how to put together a cohesive marketing concept, rather than just a bunch of scattershot efforts. He creates big ideas, and knows the marketing steps needed to back them up and make them successful. As a copywriter/content creator, he works quickly and develops high-energy content that consistently drives home the right message. His standard for quality in his work is very high.Andrew is always available and willing to help; his work ethic is unparalleled. He's also a great teacher who patiently works with his team when they struggle with concepts or execution. Andrew brought real marketing expertise to our team and was a relaxed, fun and easy person to work with. I have always enjoyed my opportunities to work with and learn from Andrew.

Matt Tarkenton
Executive Vice President at The Tarkenton Companies
March 1, 2012, Andrew worked with Matt in the same group

I have worked with Andrew Bloo on various initiatives at The Tarkenton Companies.  I have always been impressed with his communication skills, intelligence, and ability to get things done quickly and effectively.  He has great expertise in internet marketing and related fields.  In particular, he has a unique blend of technical skills and strong marketing insticts, which have enabled him to effectively perform in multiple areas at our company.His primary focus has been building online traffic for various offerings within OneMoreCustomer.com.  He also has had strong insight into our web portals at Tarkenton Financial - how to build traffic on our site, maximize email marketing campaigns and build our online brand.It can be challenging to work in a remote location, which Andrew has done with The Tarkenton Companies.  But, he has great skills in technology and marketing, strong intelligence, superior people skills; and has been able to overcome the challenges of working remotely with flying colors.  Andrew Bloo has outstanding marketing and technology skills, is a "can do" person, and demonstrates great leadership and people skills.  I highly recommend Andrew's work!

summary: Andrew provides insightful leadership and marketing guidance to businesses across multiple verticals helping to develop his rich and unique understanding of the marketing and product challenges  faced by business owners from multiple sectors.Prior to starting Cascade Hop Farm Andrew served as Vice President of Marketing at Lodestar Technologies a Tarkenton Company where he provided mentoring and guidance to the companies product development and marketing teams.  Andrew has also served as Chief Executive Officer of SciTech Software, a company whose innovative-systems approach to device driver development were instrumental in providing the tools and cross-platform device drivers required by the world‚Äôs top hardware manufacturers ( ATI, HP, Nvidia, IBM, Intel, ..) and early 3D game developers with products like SciTech SNAP and SciTech UniVBE. Andrew has also worked as Chief Marketing Officer of Jian Software where we successfully transitioned the company from a  traditional "boxed" software solution provider to an online leader of business software solutions. Under Andrews leadership JIAN experienced double digit growth for 16 straight quarters culminating in a licensing agreement with Tarkenton Companies.Specialties: Strong technical experience managing and implementing e-commerce platforms, hands-on business building expertise, systems based product development strategies, partnership development, sales management, team leadership, product life-cycle management (from concept to business profit center and ultimately building end-of-life revenue opportunities), multi-faceted cost effective marketing strategies.
name: Andrew Bloo
title: Co-Founder & CEO at Cascade Hop Farm, LLC
